title: Sunset Blvd.
simple_desc: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

title: Double Indemnity
simple_desc: A Los Angeles insurance representative lets an alluring housewife seduce him into a scheme of insurance fraud and murder that arouses the suspicion of his colleague, an insurance investigator.

title: Rebecca
simple_desc: A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his first wife's spectral presence.

title: The Third Man
simple_desc: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.

title: White Heat
simple_desc: A psychopathic criminal with a mother complex makes a daring break from prison and leads his old gang in a chemical plant payroll heist.

title: Ace in the Hole
simple_desc: A frustrated former big-city journalist now stuck working for an Albuquerque newspaper exploits a story about a man trapped in a cave to rekindle his career, but the situation quickly escalates into an out-of-control circus.

title: Out of the Past
simple_desc: A private eye escapes his past to run a gas station in a small town, but his past catches up with him. Now he must return to the big city world of danger, corruption, double crosses, and duplicitous dames.

title: The Night of the Hunter
simple_desc: A religious fanatic marries a gullible widow whose young children are reluctant to tell him where their real daddy hid the $10,000 he'd stolen in a robbery.

title: The Maltese Falcon
simple_desc: San Francisco private detective Sam Spade takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar and their quest for a priceless statuette, with the stakes rising after his partner is murdered.

title: Sweet Smell of Success
simple_desc: Powerful but unethical Broadway columnist J.J. Hunsecker coerces unscrupulous press agent Sidney Falco into breaking up his sister's romance with a jazz musician.

title: Touch of Evil
simple_desc: A stark, perverse story of murder, kidnapping and police corruption in a Mexican border town.

title: The Big Sleep
simple_desc: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a wealthy family. Before the complex case is over, he's seen murder, blackmail and what might be love.

title: Notorious
simple_desc: The daughter of a convicted Nazi spy is asked by American agents to gather information on a ring of Nazi scientists in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?

title: The Killing
simple_desc: Crook Johnny Clay assembles a five-man team to plan and execute a daring racetrack robbery.

title: Mildred Pierce
simple_desc: A hard-working mother inches towards disaster as she divorces her husband and starts a successful restaurant business to support her spoiled daughter.

title: Strangers on a Train
simple_desc: A psychopath forces a tennis star to comply with his theory that two strangers can get away with murder.

title: Laura
simple_desc: A police detective falls in love with the woman whose murder he is investigating.

title: The Lost Weekend
simple_desc: The desperate life of a chronic alcoholic is followed through a four-day drinking bout.

title: In a Lonely Place
simple_desc: A potentially violent screenwriter is a murder suspect until his lovely neighbor clears him. However, she soon starts to have her doubts.

title: The Big Heat
simple_desc: Tough cop Dave Bannion takes on a politically powerful crime syndicate.

title: Angels with Dirty Faces
simple_desc: A priest tries to stop a gangster from corrupting a group of street kids.

title: To Have and Have Not
simple_desc: During World War II, American expatriate Harry Morgan helps transport a French Resistance leader and his beautiful wife to Martinique while romancing a sensuous lounge singer.

title: Shadow of a Doubt
simple_desc: A teenage girl, overjoyed when her favorite uncle comes to visit the family in their quiet California town, slowly begins to suspect that he is in fact the "Merry Widow" killer sought by the authorities.

title: The Asphalt Jungle
simple_desc: A major heist goes off as planned, but then double crosses, bad luck and solid police work cause everything to unravel.

title: Key Largo
simple_desc: A man visits his war buddy's family hotel and finds a gangster running things. As a hurricane approaches, the two end up confronting each other.

title: Scarface
simple_desc: An ambitious and nearly insane violent gangster climbs the ladder of success in the mob, but his weaknesses prove to be his downfall.

title: The Killers
simple_desc: Hit men kill an unresisting victim, and investigator Reardon uncovers his past involvement with beautiful, deadly Kitty Collins.

title: Gilda
simple_desc: A small-time gambler hired to work in a Buenos Aires casino discovers his employer's new wife is his former lover.

title: Spellbound
simple_desc: A psychiatrist protects the identity of an amnesia patient accused of murder while attempting to recover his memory.

title: Dark Passage
simple_desc: A man convicted of murdering his wife escapes from prison and works with a woman to try to prove his innocence.

title: The Lady from Shanghai
simple_desc: Fascinated by gorgeous Mrs. Bannister, seaman Michael O'Hara joins a bizarre yachting cruise, and ends up mired in a complex murder plot.

title: Kiss Me Deadly
simple_desc: A doomed female hitchhiker pulls Mike Hammer into a deadly whirlpool of intrigue, revolving around a mysterious "great whatsit".

title: The Wrong Man
simple_desc: In 1953, an innocent man named Christopher Emanuel "Manny" Balestrero is arrested after being mistaken for an armed robber.

title: The Postman Always Rings Twice
simple_desc: A married woman and a drifter fall in love, then plot to murder her husband.

title: Suspicion
simple_desc: A shy young heiress marries a charming gentleman, and soon begins to suspect he is planning to murder her.

title: The Stranger
simple_desc: An investigator from the War Crimes Commission travels to Connecticut to find an infamous Nazi.

title: Killer's Kiss
simple_desc: Ready to catch a train to his hometown, a washed-up boxer tells us about the strange and twisty events that happened to him the past couple of days.
